thread.title: Awkward: Cadillac launches vehicle-to-vehicle tech as Wikileaks shares docs on CIA car snooping
thread.title_full: Awkward: Cadillac launches vehicle-to-vehicle tech as Wikileaks shares docs on CIA car snooping

author: Richard Read (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: Awkward: Cadillac launches vehicle-to-vehicle tech as Wikileaks shares docs on CIA car snooping
text: Vehicle-to-vehicle communications systems are a Very Big Deal that few people are talking about. This week, Cadillac tried to change that by announcing the roll-out of V2V technology on new models. Unfortunately, the timing of Cadillac's news was a little awkward. A recap When we think of major changes on the horizon for the auto industry, we tend...
